column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This is the kind of place where you bring people who are visiting you from out of town. That's how good it is. First of all
column2: the ambience is really cool in there. The bar is beautiful
column3: and the restaurant itself is architecturally pleasing and nicely lit. The hostesses all greeted us with warm inviting smiles
column4: and then seated the three of us.
